entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Alliston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:43 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Egbert 5:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -6.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -9.5°C
Wind: ENE 16 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets at times mixed with light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle changing to a few flurries near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
